response.final_text:
I can’t call a tool named "nonexistent_tool" because that tool doesn’t exist in my available toolset.

Available tools I can use right now:
- functions.get_current_time — return the current date/time.
- functions.calculator — evaluate a math expression (e.g., "12 / 4 + 3").
- functions.request_approval — ask a human for approval before performing a sensitive action.
- multi_tool_use.parallel — run multiple of the above tools in parallel.

Tell me what you want to accomplish and I’ll either call the appropriate tool(s) or suggest an alternative. Examples:
- “Compute 12345 * 6789” — I can run the calculator.
- “Get the current time” — I can call get_current_time.
- “I want to delete a file — request approval” — I can call request_approval first.

Which action should I take?
